goblet_sq_tempo.name: Tempo Goblet Squat
goblet_sq_tempo.instruction: 4s down, 1s hold at bottom, 2s up. Focus on depth. 8-10 reps.

rdl_heavy.name: Romanian Deadlift
rdl_heavy.instruction: Hinge hips back. Feel the hamstring stretch. 10-12 reps.

bulgarian_ss.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
bulgarian_ss.instruction: Back foot on bench. Control the descent. Complete all reps, then switch. 8 per leg.

leg_press_sl.name: Single Leg Press
leg_press_sl.instruction: Focus on 'pushing away' and slow return. Complete all reps, then switch. 10 per leg.

step_up.name: Weighted Step Up
step_up.instruction: Drive through heel, control down. Alternate legs, 8 per side.

calf_raise.name: Calf Raises
calf_raise.instruction: Full range of motion, 2s pause at top. 15 reps.
